about_the_game:
Twisted Reality


Your late-night Mumbai train ride warps into a nightmare. Reality bends as you shift between horrifying dimensions. Each station becomes a terrifying puzzle box, challenging your sanity and survival skills.

Use your phone


Your smartphone is your only ally. Scan mysterious QR codes, follow AR pathways, and manipulate the warped environment.

Race Against Time


Navigate through three increasingly distorted stations. Solve mind-bending puzzles and evade reality-altering entities. Can you unravel the mystery and find your way home before the altered anomalies consume you?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Twisted Reality


Your late-night Mumbai train ride warps into a nightmare. Reality bends as you shift between horrifying dimensions. Each station becomes a terrifying puzzle box, challenging your sanity and survival skills.

Use your phone


Your smartphone is your only ally. Scan mysterious QR codes, follow AR pathways, and manipulate the warped environment.

Race Against Time


Navigate through three increasingly distorted stations. Solve mind-bending puzzles and evade reality-altering entities. Can you unravel the mystery and find your way home before the altered anomalies consume you?
name: Altered Anomalies Demo
short_description: You are trapped in a nightmare on Mumbai's late-night local train. Shift between horrifying alternate dimensions as reality bends around you. Use your phone to scan, analyze, and solve puzzles in the warped world. Race against time to find your way home before the altered anomalies consume you.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Hindi*, Tamil*
*languages with full audio support
